title: Jesus Ranked is such a toxic and painful environment to play in.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I go into champion select and type in chat that I will fill if need be, I can "Malz mid and wuk top" as well as play a "decent Braum support".
No one replies to any of these. I was last pick, a Thresh locked 3rd pick. It was me (5th) and 4th pick. I wait for the 4th player to tell me where he/she is going and then she/he picks Zed into a top lane at 3 second before I had to pick my champion. Drastically trying to find an ADC within the 2 second window before I accidentally dodge the match. 
Does everyone just block everyone else from chat other than their ranked partners? Does anyone know how to fucking use chat, Jesus!
You literally can't SoloQ ranked with this shit! Trying **really hard** to be *communicative and friendly* but no one responds and tells you that you suck at your role when you already told them what role you are best at! A support that keeps going aggressive in lane when the match up heavily disadvantages me on damage early. I try to CS but the support keeps stirring up trouble.

replies.body:
I always assume that if 4th pick don't lock in quickly, then they are giving you the time to pick first.

So pick first. :D

If they aren't, they'll certainly let you know!
Just lock who you want in those situations, fuck em
